mapper.select: SELECT t.id as id, t.title as title, t.summary as summary, t.is_top as isTop, t.traffic as traffic, t.create_time as createTime, t.modify_time as modifyTime, c.content as content FROM t_bas_article_info t LEFT JOIN t_bas_article_content c ON t.id = c.article_id ORDER BY t.create_time desc LIMIT 10

SELECT t.id as id, t.title as title, t.summary as summary, t.is_top as isTop, t.traffic as traffic, t.create_time as createTime, t.modify_time as modifyTime, c.content as content FROM t_bas_article_info t LEFT JOIN t_bas_article_content c ON t.id = c.article_id AND t.id = #{id} LIMIT 1
